title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a rebate of up to $765 to individuals for payroll taxes paid in 2001, to provide employers with an income tax credit of up to $765 for payroll taxes paid during the payroll tax holiday period, and for other purposes.
content: Wage Tax Cut Act of 2003 - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to each eligible individual the lesser of $765, or the amount of the individual's social security taxes, or payments to a State or local governmental pension plan, for 2001. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a 2002 refund for eligible individuals who did not receive their full 2001 refund, as provided for by this Act. Provides employers with an income tax credit of up to $765 for payroll taxes paid during the payroll tax holiday .
